system.description: Using the air currents and rushing wind, you gain a Fly speed equal to your speed, and can hover while you remain conscious. When traveling overland in a smooth, direct path, you can increase your Fly at a speed equal to double your speed in miles per hour, or half if you take other actions while flying (such as actively searching). You can use overland flight for a number of hours per day equal to your spellcasting ability modifier, or twice as long if you move half speed. If you continue to Fly after that, you must make a DC 15 Constitution save or suffer a level of fatigue. You repeat this save once each additional hour of flight.
system.prerequisite: Elemental Affinity: Air; Elemental Leap adaptation; 11th level
